title: Braveheart
tagline: Every man dies, not every man really lives.

actors.name: Mel Gibson
actors.bio: Mel Columcille Gerard Gibson was born January 3, 1956 in Peekskill, New York, USA, as the sixth of eleven children of Hutton Gibson, a railroad brakeman, and Anne Patricia (Reilly) Gibson (who died in December of 1990). His mother was Irish, from County Longford, while his American-born father is of mostly Irish descent

description: William Wallace leads a revolt against King Edward I

title: Finding Nemo

actors.name: Ellen DeGeneres
actors.bio: Emmy-winning talk show host Ellen Lee DeGeneres was born in Metairie, Louisiana, a New Orleans suburb.

actors.name: Alexander Gould
actors.bio: Gould was born and raised in Los Angeles, California, to parents Valerie and Tom Gould.

description: Clownfish Marlon searches for his missing son Nemo after he gets picked up by a scuba diver

title: Wonder Woman

actors.name: Gal Gadot
actors.bio: Gal Gadot is an Israeli actress, singer, martial artist, and model. She was born in Rosh Ha'ayin, Israel, to an Ashkenazi Jewish family.

actors.name: Chris Pine
actors.bio: Chris Pine was born in Los Angeles.

description: Amazon warrior leaves home to fight in a war and save the world
